A broken salver can be cemented., 碎托盘能被粘起来.
A tray or salver ., 托盘或盘子.
1. 丝饼纺丝机cake salver 糕点托盘cake stand 饼架

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French salve 'tray for presenting food to the king', from Spanish salva 'sampling of food', from salvar 'make safe'

entry.def: A salver is a flat object, usually made of silver, on which things are carried.

example.ex: ...silver salvers laden with flutes of champagne.
example.tran: 银制托盘上放着几杯斟在长笛杯里的香槟酒

means.word_mean: 1. a tray (or large plate) for serving food or drinks; usually made of silver

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =save,表示"救助"; 2. 完全的，安全的

stems_affixes.word_buile: salut=salv救助+ary……的→救助[身体]的→有益的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 拯救,救助;救济[者,品],救助工具;救世主
stems_affixes.word_buile: salv救助+ation表名词→n.拯救,救助;救济[者,品],救助工具;救世主
salv救助+er表名词→帮助放东西的盒子等
salv救助+age状态→n.&v.[从灾难中]抢救,海上救助
